name: Henkan Ninja
description:
Get to the stairs of the level to get to your ancestors gem!

Avoid detection and use your ability to recover what is yours!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Controls:

Move - WASD

Transform - Spacebar

Pause - ESC

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Henkan Ninja was made during Chillennium 2018 by  Christopher Kornosky (Art), Feras Khemakhem (Sounds and Music), Zack Christie (Program), and Jonathan Arauco (Program).
